ui-label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CFC113
description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of CFC113 is CCl2FCClF2.  The IUPAC name for CFC113 is 1,1,2-trichloro-1,2,2-trifluoro-ethane.
cell-methods: height: area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample)
